what: Model Bayesian Posterior Probability and Related Measures
title: Model Bayesian Posterior Probability and Related Measures
text: package assessing model uncertainty structural equation modeling (SEM) using BIC posterior probabilities, AIC weight (added), similar measures fitting neighboring models. package name, modelbpp, stands model bayesian posterior pability. Pease visit GitHub page information https://sfcheung.github.io/modelbpp/
